thread.title: Apple Sold 13 Million iPhones in Weekend Debut
thread.title_full: Apple Sold 13 Million iPhones in Weekend Debut - Bloomberg Business

author: Adam Satariano
title: Apple Sold 13 Million iPhones in Weekend Debut
text:
Apple Inc. sold 13 million iPhones during the debut weekend of its latest handsets, as enthusiasts from Beijing to New York rushed to stores to be the first with the new devices.
The results were boosted by sales in China, an increasingly critical region for Apple’s business. The company sold 10 million iPhones during the debut of the iPhone 6 and 6 Plus last year, even though the world’s most populous country wasn’t part of the initial release.
